TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: I like the food they offer in planes
A cold fish head.

A cold fish head.

That's only on the Cat airline, run by cats for cats

Cat21011001[MEOW]

... that was weird.
I have this bad habit of falling in love with almost everyone I meet. What is wrong with me...
...I don't see anything wrong with that trait...
Perhaps you see only the best in people and not anything bad?

...I don't see anything wrong with that trait...

ALMOST everyone, loverboy.

Perhaps you see only the best in people and not anything bad?

That's true but it doesn't fully explain why I feel so emotionally attached to people for no reason.

That's true but it doesn't fully explain why I feel so emotionally attached to people for no reason.

Perhaps see a specialist about that. Random people off the internet aren't always the most reliable sources.

:'( okay...

Awwwee, cute.

Perhaps see a specialist about that. Random people off the internet aren't always the most reliable sources.

I suppose so...
Hey, how was Belgium?

Good.

But the journey to and fro, sucked.

I have this bad habit of falling in love with almost everyone I meet. What is wrong with me...

Replace "everyone" with "every nice anime character" and you've got the reason why I love anime. I connect with anime characters on a much deeper level than I do people. Now, that i'm thinking about it, that's probably why some anime is such an emotional experience for me.

Belgium.

Less offensive words have been created in the many languages of the galaxy, such as joojooflop, swut and Holy Zarquon's Singing Fish.

The use of bad language can have unforseen circumstances. One example is the war between the G'gugvunts and the Vl'hurgs, caused by a casual remark made by Arthur Dent being mistaken as a terrible insult.

Simultaneous Babel Fish translation also means that any being can be rude to any other being without the need for extensive explanations. This has also started many wars.

The reason the Earth has been shunned for so long is also due to a language problem. On Earth, Belgium refers to a small country. Throughout the rest of the galaxy, Belgium is the most unspeakably rude word there is.
I wish I looked more like Renee Phoenix...
If you ever visit Sweden, I could give you a few piercings. A step on the way, at least.

Could you give me Snake Bites?

That would be bitchin'!
I sure could. I've got nails, several hammers, a tong, everything I imagine one would need to perform some piercings.
As long as you know how to cauterise wounds and disinfect your "tools" I'm up for it.

Ragebot has an inherent Kitten like personallity as of this moment. [MEOW]

(wonder where this'll go)

Of course I can cauterize things. Just take some ridiculously hot metal and press it against things.

I am an expert on sterilization too.

Of course I can cauterize things. Just take some ridiculously hot metal and press it against things.

I am an expert on sterilization too.

I'm used to pressing hot things against me so that's no problem.
...This thread is taking a interesting turn...
Indeed it is.
